game.name: WiccAtriX
game.genres: 액션, 어드벤처, 캐주얼, 인디, RPG, 전략
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 통계, Steam 순위표, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Wiccatrix is a story driven ARPG with a spellcrafting system that allows the player to create custom spells to use in combat and to solve puzzles. Your goal is to explore the lands of Terra and help restore the elemental order back to harmony.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Wiccatrix is a story driven ARPG with a spellcrafting system that allows the player to create custom spells to use in combat and to solve puzzles. Your goal is to explore the lands of Terra and help restore the elemental order back to harmony.
